languages.text: "Впрочем, я вижу, некоторые привычки Теодоры тебе передались. Что за богохульная идея ввести в свою свиту богомерзкую ксенорабыню? Да еще и приблизить ее во время церемонии, дав знак, что ты намерен{mf||а} вести дела с нелюдью?"

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, я вижу, некоторые привычки Теодоры тебе передались. Что за ужасная идея ввести в свою свиту богомерзкую ксенорабыню? Да еще и приблизить ее во время церемонии, дав знак, что ты намерен{mf||а} вести дела с нелюдью?"

languages.text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, я вижу, некоторые привычки Теодоры тебе передались. Что за богохульная идея ввести в свою свиту богомерзкую ксенорабыню? Да еще и приблизить ее во время церемонии, дав знак, что ты намерен{mf||а} вести дела с нелюдью?"

traits.locale_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidant during the ceremony, signaling that you intend to deal with inhumans?"

"I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidant during the ceremony, signaling that you intend to deal with inhumans?"

"I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

"I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

"I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

languages.text: 「お前にもシオドーラのような癖が身についてるな。なんと不敬な考えだ。神を信じぬ異種族の奴隷を側近に選ぶだと？ましてや式典でそいつを友として扱い、人間でないものと取引関係にあることを知らしめるだと？」
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前にもシオドーラのような癖が身についてるな。なんと不敬な考えだ。神を信じぬ異種族の奴隷を側近に選ぶだと？ましてや式典でそいつを友として扱い、人間でないものと取引関係にあることを知らしめるだと？」

languages.text: “我看得出来，你也沾染了西奥多拉的一部分恶习。让邪恶的异形奴隶成为你的随行人员？这是多么亵渎的想法。你甚至还让她成为你的随侍，一同参加典礼？你这是打算昭告所有人，说你打算和这些邪恶的异形交朋友吗？”
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: “我看得出来，你也沾染了西奥多拉的一部分恶习。让邪恶的异形奴隶成为你的随行人员？这是多么亵渎的想法。你甚至还让她成为你的随侍，一同参加典礼？你这是打算昭告所有人，说你打算和这些邪恶的异形交朋友吗？”

languages.text: «Veo que ha adoptado algunas de las costumbres de Theodora. ¿Qué clase de blasfemia es esta de aceptar a una impía esclava xenos en su séquito? Y, por si fuera poco, ¡la asigna como confidente durante la ceremonia, indicando que tiene intención de tratar con seres inhumanos!»
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ha adoptado algunas de las costumbres de Theodora. ¿Qué clase de blasfemia es esta de aceptar a una impía esclava xenos en su séquito? Y, por si fuera poco, ¡la asigna como confidente durante la ceremonia, indicando que tiene intención de tratar con seres inhumanos!»

languages.text: « Je vois que vous avez repris certaines des habitudes de Théodora. Vous avez osé accepter une xénos impie dans votre entourage ? Et vous l'avez même invitée à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, clamant par là haut et fort que vous avez l'intention de traiter avec des non-humains ! Y a-t-il pire blasphème ? »
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous avez repris certaines des habitudes de Théodora. Vous avez osé accepter une xénos impie dans votre entourage ? Et vous l'avez même invitée à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, clamant par là haut et fort que vous avez l'intention de traiter avec des inhumains ! Y a-t-il pire blasphème ? »

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr einige von Theodoras Eigenheiten übernommen. Was ist das für eine blasphemische Idee? Ihr nehmt eine gottlose Xenos in Euer Gefolge auf? Noch dazu als Vertraute während der Zeremonie, als Signal, dass Ihr Vereinbarungen mit Nicht-Menschen treffen wollt?"
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr einige von Theodoras Eigenheiten übernommen. Was ist das für eine blasphemische Idee? Ihr nehmt eine gottlose Xenos in Euer Gefolge auf? Noch dazu als Vertraute während der Zeremonie, als Signal, dass Ihr Vereinbarungen mit Nicht-Menschen treffen wollt?"

languages.text: "Görüyorum ki Theodora ile mizacınız benzer. İnançsız bir zeno kölesini maiyetine kabul etmek de nereden çıktı? Ayrıca merasim sırasında onu sırdaşın olarak göstermen, insan dışılarla iş birliği yapmayı düşündüğün anlamına mı geliyor?"
languages.original_text: "I see that you have picked up some of Theodora's habits. What blasphemous idea is this — to accept an ungodly xenos slave into your entourage? And to have her as your confidante during the ceremony, signalling that you intend to have dealings with inhumans?"

traits.locale_text: "Görüyorum ki Theodora ile mizacınız benzer. İnançsız bir zeno kölesini maiyetine kabul etmek de nereden çıktı? Ayrıca merasim sırasında onu sırdaşın olarak göstermen, insan dışılarla ilişki kurmayı düşündüğünü mü gösteriyor?"
